boons.name: Drunken Strike
boons.description: Your Attack inflicts Hangover.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Drunken Flourish
boons.description: Your Special inflicts Hangover.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Trippy Shot
boons.description: Your Cast lobs a projectile that bursts into Festive Fog.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Duration: 5 Sec.
  • Stun Frequency: 0.25 Sec.
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Trippy Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you, leaving behind Festive Fog.
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Drunken Dash
boons.description: Your Dash inflicts foes near you with Hangover.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Dionysus' Aid
boons.description: Your Call inflicts Hangover to foes all around you for 1.5 Sec.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Effect Range: 600
  • Max Gauge Bonus: 9 Sec. Duration
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: After Party
boons.description: If your is low after Encounters, restore to the threshold.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Life Threshold value reduced by Lasting Consequences.
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
  • Heroic Rarity only obtainable with Ambrosia Delight.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Positive Outlook
boons.description: Take less damage while at 40% or below.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Premium Vintage
boons.description: Gain when you pick up Nectar. Receive 1 Nectar now.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Unsellable
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Strong Drink
boons.description: Using a Fountain restores all and gives you bonus damage.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Life heal by fountain is still reduced by Lasting Consequences.
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Bad Influence
boons.description: Deal more damage while 3 foes are Hangover-afflicted.
boons.prerequisites: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike

boons.name: Numbing Sensation
boons.description: Your Hangover effects also make foes move slower.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Slow Duration: 4 Sec.
  • The rarity modifier used is different from other tier 2 boons.
boons.prerequisites: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike

boons.name: Peer Pressure
boons.description: Hangover-afflicted foes contaminate other nearby foes every 4 Sec.
boons.prerequisites: Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike

boons.name: High Tolerance
boons.description: Take less damage while standing in Festive Fog.
boons.prerequisites: Trippy Shot or Trippy Flare

boons.name: Black Out
boons.description:
Hangover-afflicted foes take bonus damage in Festive Fog.
  • Fog Combo Damage: +60%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Drunken Strike, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Dash, Dionysus' Aid
  • Trippy Shot, Trippy Flare

boons.name: Low Tolerance
boons.description:
Your Hangover effects stack even more times against Weak foes.
  • Bonus Hangover Stacks: 3
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Drunken Strike, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Dash, or Dionysus' Aid
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish

boons.name: Curse of Nausea
boons.description:
Your Hangover effects deal damage faster.
  • Damage Rate: .5 sec -> .35 sec
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike
  • Ares: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, or Curse of Vengeance

boons.name: Splitting Headache
boons.description:
Hangover-afflicted foes are more likely to take Critical damage.
  • Bonus Critical Chance per Hangover Stack: +1.5%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or True Shot

boons.name: Calculated Risk
boons.description:
Your foes' ranged-attack projectiles are slower.
  • Foe Projectile Speed Reduction: +50%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike
  • Athena: Athena's Aid, Divine Dash, Divine Flourish, or Divine Strike

boons.name: Ice Wine
boons.description:
Your Cast blasts an area with freezing Festive Fog that inflicts Chill.
  • Blast Damage: +30%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Trippy Shot
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash

boons.name: Exclusive Access
boons.description:
Any Boons you find have superior effects.
  • Minimum Boon Rarity: Epic
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: Drunken Strike, Drunken Flourish, Trippy Shot, Drunken Dash, or Dionysus' Aid
  • Poseidon: Tempest Strike, Tempest Flourish, Flood Shot, Tidal Dash, or Poseidon's Aid

boons.name: Scintillating Feast
boons.description:
Your Festive Fog effects also deal lightning damage periodically.
  • Lightning Damage: 60
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Dionysus: High Tolerance or Trippy Shot
  • Zeus: Lightning Strike, Thunder Flourish, Electric Shot, Thunder Dash, or Zeus' Aid

curse.name: hangover
curse.description: For 4 Seconds, victim takes damage every 0.5 seconds. Effect can stack up to 5 times by default.
